name: Fiat Chrysler Automobiles N.V.
description: Fiat Chrysler Automobiles N.V. (FCA) is a multinational automotive group with a rich heritage that spans over a century. Established through the merger of Fiat S.p.A. and Chrysler Group LLC in 2014, FCA is known for its diverse portfolio of brands that cater to various market segments. These brands include iconic names such as Jeep, Dodge, Ram, Fiat, and Alfa Romeo. FCA has a strong presence in both North American and European automotive markets, focusing on innovation, sustainability, and customer satisfaction. The company is committed to developing vehicles that not only meet the demands of consumers but also adhere to stringent environmental regulations. FCA has made significant investments in electric and hybrid technologies, aiming to lead the way in the transition to sustainable mobility. The company’s manufacturing facilities are strategically located around the globe, optimizing their production capabilities while maintaining a focus on quality and efficiency. FCA's vision includes enhancing the driving experience through advanced connectivity and autonomous driving technologies, ensuring that they remain competitive in an ever-evolving industry. With a commitment to social responsibility, FCA actively engages in community initiatives and sustainability practices, striving to make a positive impact on society. As part of the larger Stellantis group following a merger in 2021, FCA continues to play a vital role in shaping the future of the automotive landscape.

seo.meta_title: Fiat Chrysler Automobiles | Iconic Automotive Brands
seo.meta_description: Explore Fiat Chrysler Automobiles, a leader in the global automotive industry. Discover our diverse range of vehicles, commitment to sustainability, and innovative technologies.

faq.question: What is Fiat Chrysler Automobiles known for?
faq.answer: Fiat Chrysler Automobiles is known for its diverse range of automotive brands and commitment to innovation and sustainability.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Fiat Chrysler Automobiles?
faq.answer: Carlos Tavares is the CEO of Fiat Chrysler Automobiles.

faq.question: Where is Fiat Chrysler Automobiles headquartered?
faq.answer: Fiat Chrysler Automobiles is headquartered in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

faq.question: What are Fiat Chrysler Automobiles' main brands?
faq.answer: Fiat Chrysler Automobiles' main brands include Fiat, Jeep, Dodge, Ram, and Alfa Romeo.

faq.question: When was Fiat Chrysler Automobiles founded?
faq.answer: Fiat Chrysler Automobiles was formed in 2014 through the merger of Fiat S.p.A. and Chrysler Group LLC.
